title: [Updated Nov 1st] Journey Toward the Sixth Star - Ch. VI
content: A new star is coming to Maple World, a new source of power beyond anything that's come before.

title: Journey Toward the Sixth Star - Ch. VI
content: A new star is coming to Maple World, a new source of power beyond anything that's come before.

title: Miracle Summer - August 26 - Shoes
content: This Saturday, August 26, 2023, Maplers on all Worlds will have Miracle Time enabled for Shoe Equipment!

title: World's Best Punch King Winners
content: Check out the winners of the Worldâ€™s Best Punch King event and pick up your rewards!

title: Wongstaurant's Final Orders
content: This is it, Wongstaurant's Final Orders! At the end, you'll have one final decision to make.

title: Miracle Summer - August 12 - Accessories/Emblems/Hearts/Rings
content: This Saturday, August 12, 2023, Maplers on all Worlds will have Miracle Time enabled for Face Accessories, Eye Accessories, Pendants, Shoulders, Rings, Earrings, Belts, Badges, Emblems, and Android Hearts!

title: Journey Toward the Sixth Star - Ch. V
content: It's time to Journey Toward the Sixth Star! Play through the different chapters of the Journey Toward the Sixth Star event and earn some unique rewards.

title: Miracle Summer - July 29 - Gloves
content: This Saturday, July 29, 2023, Maplers on all Worlds will have Miracle Time enabled for Gloves!

title: Journey Toward the Sixth Star Event
content: It's time to Journey Toward the Sixth Star! Play through the different chapters of the Journey Toward the Sixth Star event and earn some unique rewards.

title: Miracle Summer - July 15 - Primary Weapons/Secondary Equipment
content: This Saturday, July 15, 2023, Maplers on all Worlds will have Miracle Time enabled for Primary Weapons and Secondary Equipment!

title: Khali, the Wind of Vengeance, is Now Available!
content: Begin Khali's journey in Maple World with a pair of events just for Khali players, the Khali's Journey Event and the Khali's Wish Event!

title: Miracle Summer: July 1 - Tops/Bottoms/Overalls/Capes
content: This Saturday, July 1, 2023, Maplers on all Worlds will have Miracle Time enabled for Tops, Bottoms, Overalls and Cape Equipment!

title: Hyper Burning and Burning World Event!
content: The Savior update is here, and Hyper Burning is returning until November with Burning World and Burning World Step Up here for the summer!
